name: Freedom Knight (variable name)
description:
This is my first full prototype / game demo.  Feedback and support is welcome, and feel free to visit my page on Kickstarter to help out as well (profile is 21jturgoose1).  The plan is that if I get support, I'll turn this into a full game, adding in a lot more mechanics, more levels, etc.

I know there are some bugs and issues, please do not mind those for now.

Controls: WASD/arrow keys, spacebar to end text and to attack.

If you have any questions or comments feel free to email my game dev email; CreationGoose@gmail.com
